title: Conquer Kingdoms

controls: Move Troops: Use WASD or the arrow keys to walk, or click and drag your mouse.Thunder Strike: Press the Spacebar to call down a huge bolt of lightning.Zoom In/Out: Scroll with your mouse wheel to view the map from close up or far away.
content.howToPlay:
In Conquer Kingdoms, you begin with a squad of five soldiers. They’ll follow your every move, so guide them into unknown territory to battle the red-armored foes. Once you triumph, treasure chests await you, as their king, just walk over them to pick them up. But keep in mind, your army members can also act as servants to carry your loot, which means fewer fighters if you face another enemy. So don’t get greedy! Bring your treasure home regularly so you can expand and strengthen your domain. Once you’ve collected chests, head to your Treasury. There, you can turn all that loot into coins, which will come in handy for forging better gear.

If your team is defeated, you can resurrect at your castle. Your castle is the heart of your kingdom. Heal up your crew here and upgrade it to unlock bigger battles and grander conquests. But any chests you were carrying while battle will remain where you fell. Don’t worry, gather some upgrades, rebuild your army, and head back for revenge. It’s all part of becoming a stronger king in this fun free game online. Lastly, the Forge to craft sturdier armor, sharpen your weapons, and even recruit more soldiers for your growing army.
content.tips: If you carry too many chests, you’ll lack soldiers for defense. Return to base more often for safe deposits. Or else, boost your carrying capacity by upgrading the castle’s flag. More storage means more treasure you can lug back home before needing to refill your ranks.Keep an eye on the temple’s energy meter. Once it’s full, head over for a prayer and earn the power to call down a devastating lightning strike. Timing is key, use this shock-and-awe ability when you face especially tricky battles with dragons.Focus on forging better armor and weapons early on. A sturdy army is more valuable than other fancy upgrades you might not need right away.While roaming the map, watch out for small golden pouches. These random drops can give you a little bump in resources exactly when you need it.If you lose a battle and drop your treasure, take the time to reinforce your forces and attack again. The treasure will still be there!
content.developer: This awesome kingdom-building game was crafted by FreezeNova. They’re known for creating high quality browser games.
